text: Predrag Rogan (; born 2 August 1974) is a Serbian football manager and former player. ==Career== In July 2015, Rogan took charge of Serbian League West side Mačva Šabac. He led them to promotion to the Serbian First League in the 2015–16 season. In January 2017, it was reported that Rogan parted ways with the club. He moved to Hungary the same month and joined Nebojša Vignjević as his assistant at Újpest. In January 2018, Rogan terminated his contract with the club by mutal consent. He subsequently returned to Serbia and became manager of Serbian First League side TSC Bačka Topola. In October 2018, Rogan was appointed manager of Serbian SuperLiga club Spartak Subotica. He left the position by mutual agreement in June 2019. The same month, Rogan took over at fellow SuperLiga side Napredak Kruševac. On 1 June 2020, he was appointed as the manager of the Nemzeti Bajnokság I club Újpest FC after Nebojša Vignjević was sacked.http://m.nemzetisport.hu/labdarugo_nb_i/vignjevics-az-uj-edzovel- kell-bizonyitani-jobbak-mint-ahol-allunk-2765197 Újpest was ranked 10th out of 12 teams and Rogan has seven matches left to keep Újpest in the first division. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Expatriate football managers in Hungary Category:Expatriate football managers in Kuwait Category:FK Loznica players Category:FK Napredak Kruševac managers Category:FK Rad managers Category:FK Spartak Subotica managers Category:FK Zemun managers Category:Serbian expatriate football managers Category:Serbian expatriate sportspeople in Hungary Category:Serbian expatriate sportspeople in Kuwait Category:Serbian football managers Category:Serbian footballers Category:Serbian SuperLiga managers Category:Sportspeople from Loznica Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I managers Category:Újpest FC managers
title: Predrag Rogan
